/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the blend of modern and traditional styles that are characteristic of Beijing. The buildings, bathed in sunlight, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape. In the distance, the silhouette of mountains can be seen, adding a touch of nature's majesty to the urban landscape.
